thread.title: Manchester United winger Jesse Lingard shows off new customised £200,000 Bentley GT to add to expanding fleet of pimped cars
thread.title_full: Manchester United winger Jesse Lingard shows off new customised £200,000 Bentley GT to add to expanding fleet of pimped cars

author: tsheen
title: Manchester United winger Jesse Lingard shows off new customised £200,000 Bentley GT to add to expanding fleet of pimped cars
text:
EFL THEY SEE ME ROLL-LIN Manchester United winger Jesse Lingard shows off new customised £200,000 Bentley GT to add to expanding fleet of pimped cars 
England international, 24, adds dash of red to each of his cars By Tom Sheen 30th March 2017, 3:00 pm Updated: 30th March 2017, 3:01 pm Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments JESSE LINGARD has showed off his new customised £200,000 Bentley Continental GT on a shopping trip to Manchester. 
The Manchester United winger, who is in talks over a new Old Trafford deal , has a growing fleet of custom cars. Eamonn and James Clarke Manchester United winger Jesse Lingard was in his new customised £200,000 Bentley Continental GT Eamonn and James Clarke 6 The 24-year-old was out with pals at Selfridges in Manchester city centre 
The 24-year-old , who played for England against Germany last week, was on a trip to Selfridges in Manchester city centre with pals. 
Keep up to date with ALL the Manchester United news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
Lingard was seen hopping into a new Bentley Continental GT. 
The winger also has an £80,000 Mercedes C63S AMG and £120,000 Range Rover Sport in his collection – each with a custom flourish. 
All three motors boast custom body kits, while Lingard has shown his loyalty to his club with little dashes of red. MOST READ IN FOOTBALL YOU WHAT? Bastian Schweinsteiger unveiled by Chicago Fire... and journalist asks him if his new MLS side can now win the World Cup CHELSEA CIVIL WAR Romelu Lukaku top of director of football Michael Emenalo's list to replace Diego Costa but boss Antonio Conte wants Alvaro Morata In Safe Hands Manchester United ready to make David De Gea one of their top earners to keep Real Madrid at bay Sticking point Everton coach leaves the club just days after his wonderkid son rejected the Toffees for Manchester United WIDE OF THE MARC Chelsea set to lose £70million fight with Barcelona for PSG's Italy midfield star Marco Verratti Luk Here Chelsea top brass want Romelu Lukaku back to prove to old boss Jose Mourinho that he was wrong to sell him, David Luiz and Kevin de Bruyne BLACK CAT-AMARAN SAVIOUR Sunderland hero Duncan Watmore left shaken after saving three lives in Barbados boat crash What a mistake Team of stars Manchester United booted out too soon including England new boy Michael Keane taking the cris Bizarre new bust of Cristiano Ronaldo sparks brilliant memes including Bowser and Sloth from the Goonies tangled webb Leyton Orient manager Danny Webb to resign from crisis club after bust-up with Francesco Becchetti No Joshing Manchester United open talks with Bayern Munich over deal for Joshua Kimmich – but City want him too 'EVEN JESUS DIDN'T PLEASE EVERYONE' Cristiano Ronaldo sculptor defends widely-mocked statue... and insists CR7 likes it SECRETS and lies Arsene Wenger refuses to confirm he's staying as Arsenal manager despite admitting he HAS made a decision... as he takes cheeky dig at Chelsea over Alexis Sanchez bid hollywood cole Former England star Ashley Cole goes out for dinner with girlfriend Sharon Canu just days after his ex Cheryl has a baby Settle the Bil Chelsea agree £500k fee for wonderkid Billy Gilmour - but Rangers haven't given up hope of keeping him CHELSEA? Alexis Sanchez casts doubts over Arsenal future after saying he wants to stay in London and play for winning team Yes way Jose Jose Mourinho is eyeing up a potential move for Atletico Madrid centre-back Jose Gimenez 'He is absurd' Jose Mourinho compares Manchester United's attempts to buy Neymar as like trying to crack open a vault Handy Andy Gladbach confirm Andreas Christensen WILL return to Chelsea after ace impressed Antonio Conte Eamonn and James Clarke 6 Lingard’s £120,000 Range Rover Sport has a red flourish on the hood of the car 
His Mercedes has red decals on the wing, while his the words ‘Range Rover’ are also red on the bonnet of the car. 
Both of those have been wrapped in a matte finish. 
The new Bentley has a subtle flash of red on the badge on the car’s hood – as well as a custom body kit to give it a meaner, more aggressive look. Eamonn and James Clarke 6 Lingard also has a Mercedes C63 AMG worth around £80,000 
Lingard’s deal will run out at the end of next season – but his new deal is expected to net him a cool £95,000-a-week. 
The winger has been with United since he was just seven, but is desperate to stay with his boyhood club. 
“The contract is still ongoing with talks at the moment – and my heart is at Man United,” Lingard said. 
“There’s a lot of competition for places but I think that’s good for the group. 
“You have to battle for your place and it makes you more hungry on the training pitch and you know when you get your chance, you have to take it. AP:Associated Press Lingard is expected to sign a new deal worth £95,000-a-week under Manchester United boss Jose Mourinho Getty Images 6 Jesse Lingard celebrates his goal at Middlesbrough before the international break 
“The likes of Mkhitaryan, Zlatan, Pogba, big names in our team, it always good to look up to them and see what they have achieved and obviously we gain that experience off them and learn off them, especially the young players. 
“It’s always good to have that hunger to try to break into that team.” Jesse Lingard and Nathan Redmond show off awful dance moves ahead of England v Lithuania
